name: Arrogance
trigger: Bestial Failure using Dominate or Presence
effect: Suffer dice penalties until asserting superiority
resolution: Successfully dominate or socially overpower another

name: Cruelty
trigger: Bestial Failure using Brawl or Intimidation
effect: Must cause harm or suffer penalties

name: Paranoia
trigger: Bestial Failure using Awareness or Investigation
effect: Distrust others; penalties to cooperative actions
resolution: Expose or confront a perceived threat

name: Wantonness
trigger: Bestial Failure using Performance or Persuasion
effect: Seek immediate gratification; penalties to restraint
